Selected Figure/Table: Fig 4 - 24h Control x 25 mg.kg-1 Lead Acetate
Statistical Test: The gene expression of thioredoxin reductase-1 in the control rats was compared with that of those exposed to 25 mg/kg lead at each time point using Student’s t-test.
Data Processing:
The efficiency per
sample was calculated using LinRegPCR 11.0 Software (http://
LinRegPCR.nl), and the stability of the reference genes, Rlp13a and
GAPDH (M-value) and the optimal number of reference genes
according to the pairwise variation (V) were analysed by GeNorm 3.5
Software (http://medgen.ugent.be/genorm/). The relative RNA
expression levels were determined using the 2DDCT method.
Assumed Test for Sample Size Calculation: Two-sample t test power calculation with unequal variances

Statistical Test: one-way ANOVA with Dunnett’s post-hoc test

normalized to an endogenous housekeeping gene (GAPDH) and values expressed relative to biological control
values.

Data Processing:
